address: Xã An Bình, Huyện Lạc Thủy, Tỉnh Hoà Bình
thought:
**Finding the New Administrative Unit for the Old Address**

Okay, here's my thought process. The user needs the new administrative unit (ward) for the old address "Xã An Bình, Huyện Lạc Thủy, Tỉnh Hoà Bình." I'll break it down step-by-step.

First, I identified the old province: "Tỉnh Hoà Bình." Then, I dove into provincial resolutions, specifically 60-NQ/TW. This is the key. I needed to see if "Tỉnh Hoà Bình" was merged or kept as is. And bingo! The resolution clearly stated that "Hoà Bình" merged with "Vĩnh Phúc" and "Phú Thọ," ultimately becoming "Phú Thọ." So, the new province is now "Tỉnh Phú Thọ."

Next up, I had to identify the old ward, which is "Xã An Bình." The challenge was finding out what happened to this ward after the merger. I started searching other relevant resolutions, keeping "Xã An Bình" and "Tỉnh Hoà Bình" in mind (or the new province, "Tỉnh Phú Thọ").

I found it in resolution `1676/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Phú Thọ`. It's a gold mine! This resolution detailed the administrative restructuring in "Tỉnh Phú Thọ." Specifically, it mentions the merging of "Hưng Thi," "Thống Nhất," and "An Bình" into a new "Xã An Bình"! And the kicker? The old address I have also includes "Xã An Bình." While the resolution doesn't explicitly link "Lạc Thủy" (the old district) to this particular "An Bình", given that both are mentioned within the same context in the resolution, the link is almost certain. This means that the "An Bình" in the old "Hoà Bình" province is now within the new "Phú Thọ" province.

With this crucial information, I have a new ward name: "Xã An Bình." The last step is straightforward: finding the ward code for this new "Xã An Bình" in "Tỉnh Phú Thọ" from the `New wards` data. And here it is! `{"ward_code":"05425","ward_name":"Xã An Bình","province_name":"Tỉnh Phú Thọ"}`.

Putting it all together, I am confident in this finding, thus confidence high. I can construct the JSON output. I'm going to base this on the relevant section of the resolution, and it will give the province name ("Tỉnh Phú Thọ"), ward code ("05425"), and ward name ("Xã An Bình").

citation.header: 1676/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Phú Thọ
citation.line: 114. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Hưng Thi, Thống Nhất và An Bình thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã An Bình.
